oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edward Dougherty Collection
Careful efficient workers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An exterior billboard illustrating a white cross surrounded by the words, "universal safety" and the words, "Careful Efficient Workers." The beginning letters C, E, and W are highlighted.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Billboards; War work
